name: Breachshot
description:
Breachshot is a Sci-Fi, Top Down, Pixel Art, Bubble Shooter and Shoot 'em up Hybrid.

 The monster research wing has been breached and they have escaped. Using the Lab's experimental guns, Mike has to contain and destroy all the monsters. Select different colour ammo to counteract the different elemental mutated animals. As they try to get rid of the one thing standing between them and freedom . . . YOU!

Requirements

  • Any smartphone running Android 10 - 13.
  • More than 81 MB of space for installation and save data.
  • More than 2GB RAM

This game is currently in alpha and I would very much appreciate the feedback. Please if you have time follow the link to a google form and answer a few questions regarding the current state of the game here: Feedback Form
